text: @bbcnickrobinson How about investigating how much money this Government have wasted on Brexit,ie ferries and on useless covid-19 tests, dyson ventilators etc.  Are the costs more or less of that , you criticised Labour during the election? How much in debt is the Uk now in after yrs of austerity?

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
